Reviews.Title: Voyager- almost three years later...
Reviews.Author: A. Gift For You "GradStu"
Reviews.Content: I've had this exact model since May, 2009 and just last week it finally stopped charging properly, though it still works.  Although it isn't a smartphone, it does have internet capabilities (very slow, I might add), and you need not be in a hot-spot zone (if that's the correct lingo!) to use the internet.  The inside qwerty keyboard is large (which I love), and I have yet to find a phone similar now that I want a smart phone.  I've just ordered another one of these phones (awaiting its arrival), just to serve out the remainder of the two year agreement I have with Verizon. Since the phone was working well when my upgrade came available, I opted instead to get a Samsung tablet (which I dropped, it cracked, and now it doesn't work!!!) I've no complaints about this phone, and just transferred all my photos and videos from it onto a micro card just in case it (my current phone) goes completely dead.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Lg Voyager Vx10000
Reviews.Content: I really wasn't sure to expect, being a used phone. It turned out to be great. The price was reasonable to! I love this phone and it does not require a data package for Verizon Wireless. I am very happy and would recommend this phone to anyone that loves to text, or just is looking for a great touch screen phone!

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: Scott Hiebert
Reviews.Content: I have had this version of this phone for 4.5 years. I have no need for a smart phone and the new "dumb" phones are made terribly. that's why I rebought this one.

Reviews.Title: batteries no good
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: the batteries are no good and Verizon said they stopped making the batteries for these phones. Had to get a different phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: Shipping for this phone was a little slow but in the end it was worth the wait.  All in all this phone met my expectations.  The touch screen freezes from time to time but corrects itself.  There was only one flaw in this phone that bothered me, they inside keyboard lights dont light up and it makes a beepying noise.  I however cannot expect this phone to be perfect as it is a refurbished phone and not brand new.  It works great for the things I need it to do such as call and message.  Every feature that is availiable works.  For a refurbished phone this is about as good as it gets.  The battery on it holds a pretty good charge as well.

Reviews.Title: Not as desribed.
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: I received the phone on time. But I received it nt as described. It said that it was used but in very good condition. That is not how it came. It had alot of scraches, it felt like it had been in the sand, & all the contacts were still on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Best phone
Reviews.Author: johanne cusick
Reviews.Content: Got it very used but a great old phone.. I'm not very interested in the new expensive phone with internet.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Melanie F Pryor
Reviews.Content: I love the voyager and have owned many of them. The only problem is that, after a year of use, the connections in the flip start to come apart, and the phone stops working. Only good if you need the phone to last you a year or so. However, it has the best camera I have ever seen on any cell phone.

Reviews.Title: LG Voyager vx10000 phone Titanium
Reviews.Author: Debra Matos
Reviews.Content: This phone was terrible, certain letters would not type for texting, they were sticking and not working.  I had multiple problems with this phone.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: KnollAdmin
Reviews.Content: You never really know what the cell phone can or can not do. For the most part this phone will do the job texting and calling. audio clear and loud.  Did have a problem with no display but from that I could press on a edge of the phone and the display returns. I did not have to press to many times working fine except for the battery. Battery got where it would not hold a charge, ordered replacement battery found out after a week of use the battery was not a Motorola type and would not work. New battery cost as much as the phone. Using different phone now.

Reviews.Title: much needed info missing
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Description sounded good but product was scratched and it didn't come with a charger so i had to order that seperately.  People selling stuff should be honest. Glad my son didn't mind the condition.

Reviews.Title: Total lie...
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: Its a piece of $120.00 crap... It says no contract yeah right! Verizon won't let it operate on the pre paid plan. YOU HAVE TO HAVE A CONTRACT!!!!

Reviews.Title: This phone is junk
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: I odered this phone from Amazon in April. It broke in August. Website will not let us return it and now we are out the full cost of this phone. The place where you put in the charger literally fell out. It is one crappy phone. Mobtech needs to refund our money. I wish we could figure out how to contact them.

Reviews.Title: Works great, but has a constant buzz when the flip screen is open.
Reviews.Author: mamatart
Reviews.Content: This phone has been ok, but I had to get use to the space bar not being in the middle bottom of the key board (it is on the bottom sides). Also when the flip screen is open, there is this constant buzz....this can drive you crazy if you are texting in a quiet place! It is an ok phone as far as regular texting phones go!

Reviews.Title: LG voyager
Reviews.Author: Tfd86
Reviews.Content: Had some problems with receiving working phone and correct chargers at first. Everything taken care of and all set now.

Reviews.Title: Crap I say
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Piselli "Richie Rich"
Reviews.Content: I was stupid enough to buy three of these junks. I figured the my family would enjoyhaving new phones and all alike. The keyboards don't work completely. Expect some keys not to work. The front touch screen won't allow you to scroll up or down because it's to responsive and when you touch it to scroll it pics that contact.It"s frustrating. I have three for sale, cheap.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Name
Reviews.Content: I haven't recieved this product yet but if it's anything like my last voyager, its a great phone! get it! I, personally, never had a problem with it until I lost it. The key board is a good size and easy to use. I love this phone! I prefer the titanium color only because thats what i had before. hope you like it!

Reviews.Title: Way Out Of Date
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: The device was delivered as described by the vendor, but was so old/out of date Verizon was unable to update the software on the cell phone. This resulted in the phone only being available for calls and regular text messages. Any feature requiring web access would not work (including picture text messages). Be careful if you intend to buy this phone and expect it to support all of the features typically found on a cell phone to work.

Reviews.Title: LG Voyager VX10000 Phone, Titanium (Verizon Wireless) QWERTY
Reviews.Author: baseball-dad
Reviews.Content: LG Voyager VX10000 Phone, Titanium (Verizon Wireless) QWERTY - No Contract Required product was new but older product not misrepresented I did not do my home work

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: ronald l stoll
Reviews.Content: there are pixels that are not working, battery life is very short... sounds like your in a tunnel..sad, wish i had just went to phone store and got a phone.
